wikipedia_page.main: Ralph Eustace Hemingway (15 December 1877 – 15 October 1915) was an English first-class cricketer active 1903–14 who played for Nottinghamshire. He was born in Macclesfield and was killed in France on active service during World War I.

link_mentions.page: List of cricketers who were killed during military service

response: :— Ralph Hemingway, English cricketer (15 October 1915), fatally wounded during World War I
